cards.name: Анна
cards.hint: Между Мария и Зоя ровно 2 невиновных
cards.hint_en: There are exactly 2 innocents between Mary and Zoe

cards.name: Бенджамин
cards.hint: There is only one innocent between Руслана and Зоя
cards.hint_en: There is only one innocent between Ruby and Zoe

cards.name: Чад
cards.hint: Only 1 of the 4 criminals neighboring Григорий is in column D
cards.hint_en: Only 1 of the 4 criminals neighboring Gary is in column D

cards.name: Донна
cards.hint: Григорий has the most criminal neighbors
cards.hint_en: Gary has the most criminal neighbors

cards.name: Елена
cards.hint: There's an equal number of innocents in columns B and E
cards.hint_en: There's an equal number of innocents in columns B and E

cards.name: Григорий
cards.hint: An odd number of innocents between Григорий and Виктор neighbor Ной
cards.hint_en: An odd number of innocents between Gary and Vince neighbor Noah

cards.name: Харитон
cards.hint: Григорий is one of Кевин's 5 innocent neighbors
cards.hint_en: Gary is one of Kevin's 5 innocent neighbors

cards.name: Исаак
cards.hint: Григорий and Виктор have an equal number of innocent neighbors
cards.hint_en: Gary and Vince have an equal number of innocent neighbors

cards.name: Ясон
cards.hint: Павел is one of 2 criminals between Харитон and Ксения
cards.hint_en: Paul is one of 2 criminals between Hal and Xena

cards.name: Кевин
cards.hint: У Ксения больше невиновных соседей, чем у Донна
cards.hint_en: Xena has more innocent neighbors than Donna

cards.name: Люся
cards.hint: Both criminals between Чад and Павел are Кевин's neighbors
cards.hint_en: Both criminals between Chad and Paul are Kevin's neighbors

cards.name: Мария
cards.hint: All innocents between Чад and Павел are connected
cards.hint_en: All innocents between Chad and Paul are connected

cards.name: Ной
cards.hint: У Донна и Анна одинаковое число соседей-преступников
cards.hint_en: Donna and Anna have an equal number of criminal neighbors
